ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No! I swear by the Day of Rising!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL TO WITNESS the Day of Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay, I swear by the Day of Resurrection;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! I swear by the day of resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No! I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, I swear by the Day of Resurrection;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I swear by the Day of Resurrection!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I swear by the Day of Resurrection;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No! I swear by the Day of Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:1] Nay! (the lā is extra in both instances) I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said concerning the interpretation of Allah's (Nay, I swear by the Day of Resurrection): '(Nay, I swear by the Day of Resurrection) He says: I swear that the Day of Resurrection will happen;
